text: George Dzundza ( ; born July 19, 1945) is an American actor. He was born in Rosenheim, Germany. His father was Ukrainian and his mother was Polish. He spent the first couple years of his life in displaced persons camps.DATELINE NEW YORK: New Yorkers bring culture to Catskills (09/13/98) He was an original cast member of the long-running NBC drama Law & Order, playing NYPD Sergeant Max Greevey in the first season.
